name: Mr.Fish
description:
This is a simple Game made by Wondrous Games Studio(me). I put myself under a challenge of creating a game under 5mins and I succeeded!!.Try playing the game and let me know your highscore in the comment box below.This game was made with Scratch

Rules:

Help mr.Fish to catch as many as stars as you can under a 30sec timer. All The Best!!

Note: This game requires flash to run so if the browser prompts ,  pls click allow to play the game.

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move around

-Wondrous Games Studio
